session_summary: Andrew and Audrey discussed Andrew's search for a dog to adopt at 10:47 am on 6 May, 2023. Andrew talked about the challenges and joys of the process, considering factors like living space and breed requirements. Audrey offered advice on considering a dog's space and energy needs. Andrew shared his difficulties in finding pet-friendly housing near nature. They also discussed the joy of road trips with dogs, with Audrey sharing her experience and Andrew expressing his desire to do the same. Audrey wished Andrew luck in finding the perfect furry friend and offered to help. They exchanged goodbyes, with Andrew heading to another shelter and Audrey looking forward to updates on the search.

conversation_turns.speaker: Andrew
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photography of a dog looking through a cage at the camera
conversation_turns.text: Hey! Since we last spoke, I've been looking for a doggo to adopt - browsing websites, visiting shelters and asking friends of theirs. It's been both fun and annoying!

conversation_turns.speaker: Audrey
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of two dogs running in a field with a ball in their mouth
conversation_turns.text: Sounds like a fun and demanding task! Getting to meet new pups must bring so much happiness. What  do you think you can do to make the process smoother?

conversation_turns.speaker: Andrew
conversation_turns.text: Meeting all these adorable pups has been awesome! For those considering getting a pup, the size of living space and the exercise needs of the breed are important. For me, a person living in an apartment, a smaller dog would be best, but if one is active, consider getting one that loves to play and run.

conversation_turns.speaker: Audrey
conversation_turns.text: That's some good advice! It's important to consider the space and energy needs of a dog.

conversation_turns.speaker: Andrew
conversation_turns.text: Yeah! Finding a pet-friendly place to live has been tough too. I'm contacting landlords and checking out neighborhoods to find the perfect spot.

conversation_turns.speaker: Audrey
conversation_turns.text: Guessing it's tough to find housing. Any particular part of town you want to live in?

conversation_turns.speaker: Andrew
conversation_turns.text: I'm looking for a place near a park or woods, so I can stay close to nature and give the dog a large open space to run around

conversation_turns.speaker: Audrey
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photography of three dogs running through a field of grass
conversation_turns.query: dogs playing field flowers national park
conversation_turns.text: That's a good plan! I'm lucky to have a park near me - it's great for my pup's walks. Last Friday we took a road trip - we went to a beautiful national park and my dogs had a blast! It was an awesome trip!

conversation_turns.speaker: Andrew
conversation_turns.text: Nice! Glad the pups had a great road trip. Do you take them on road trips often?

conversation_turns.speaker: Audrey
conversation_turns.text: I take them on road trips once every couple of months. It's a great way for them to explore and stay active.

conversation_turns.speaker: Andrew
conversation_turns.text: Wow, that's awesome! I really wish I could go on a road trip with a furry companion.

conversation_turns.speaker: Audrey
conversation_turns.text: It's a cool experience. Having your furry friends on a road trip is an amazing experience. They make it really fun and exciting. It's definitely something to look forward to!

conversation_turns.speaker: Andrew
conversation_turns.text: Adding that to my bucket list! Can't wait for the day I actually go on a trip with my dog!

conversation_turns.speaker: Audrey
conversation_turns.text: Good luck with your search! Fingers crossed you find the perfect one.

conversation_turns.speaker: Andrew
conversation_turns.text: Thanks! Your help is much appreciated. I'm still on the lookout for the perfect furry friend.

conversation_turns.speaker: Audrey
conversation_turns.text: Not a problem, I'm glad to help! Good luck with your search!

conversation_turns.speaker: Andrew
conversation_turns.text: Thanks! I'll let you know how it goes.

conversation_turns.speaker: Audrey
conversation_turns.text: Definitely, keep me posted and let me know if you need any suggestions or help.

conversation_turns.speaker: Andrew
conversation_turns.text: Will do! Really apprecieate it.

conversation_turns.speaker: Audrey
conversation_turns.text: Yup! You got it, I'll be expecting a pic of your dog soon! :)

conversation_turns.speaker: Andrew
conversation_turns.text: Haha I can't wait. I'll ttyl, gotta check out another shelter soon.

conversation_turns.speaker: Audrey
conversation_turns.text: Have fun! Ttyl!
